title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.7 - 09/04/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 09/04/2015, starting at 01:30 AM AEST, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.7. At 03:00 AM AEST, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. 

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

The Patch download will be approximately 262MB.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: I am now stuck I can not connect to my game in any way. It bugged out at the end of our champ selection faze

i think your servers are a little bit fucked after this patch, due to 3 or more players disconnecting at the same time during games and the complaints of abnormal ping spikes up to 3000 for a few seconds. i might be wrong but from the many games i have played since the patch i and many others i have played with have experienced this.

> [{quoted}](name=Woljin,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=u19MA57L,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-09T00:58:55.660+0000)
>
> so we cant play league for 6 hours now ?

Read the post properly. Realise how stupid that question is.
Good gawd your loading screens cut off half of red team
launcher wont load completely after 5.7 patch update , need some help fixing this
Riot, your servers are fucking dirt shit cancer fucking awful. Kindly please fix.
